page.title: 16Sonning Fire Station
page.content: In Sonning there is a retained station which means the firemen have other jobs.It is situated on Pound Lane near the junction with Pearson Road. There has been a fire station there since before the first world war.The modern fire engine is made by{DODGE,} it is a HCB ANGUS.Its fleet number is{ {A25}and its number plate is LDP 492W. On the engine they have eleven or more hoses.The engine was built in 1981.In the fireman's coat he keeps a notebook, a pair of gloves and a whistle ,he also keeps his bleeper.The men are called by their bleepers when there is a fire.The first man at the station opens up and pushes a button that tells him where the fire is.There are 16 firemen and there are 6 firemen in a crew.
